text: Daali is an upcoming Indian Kannada-language Gangster action drama film written and directed by Prabhu Srinivas. The score and soundtrack of the film is composed by Anoop Seelin. == Cast == * Dhananjay as Daali * Rachita Ram * Baburaj == Production == The film was announced in February 2019 by producer Yogesh Narayan under his banner Yogesh Motion Pictures who has earlier produced Modalasala and Eradane Sala. Director Prabhu Srinivas who has earlier directed four films including Ganapa and Kariya 2 was roped in. == References == == External links == * Category:Upcoming films Category:Indian films Category:Indian crime action films Category:Indian gangster films Category:Indian action drama films Category:Indian crime drama films Category:Upcoming Kannada-language films Category:Kannada-language films
title: Daali
